meanings.definition: Consisting of separate parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The bracelet was partite, made of individual links connected together.
meanings.sent2: The painting was partite, with distinct elements in separate areas of the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The music piece sounded partite, with each instrument playing its own unique part.
meanings.sent4: Her speech felt partite, jumping from one topic to another without a clear connection.
